name: Ahmet Arslan
body:
Search architect, consultant, all but dissertation PhD candidate, fitness enthusiast, Apache Solr veteran, loves Open Source Software. Currently focused on term frequency distribution analysis.

Ahmet Arslan has been working as Research Assistant at [Anadolu University](https://www.anadolu.edu.tr) since December 2004.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
